org.ensembl.driver
Interface SequenceAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface SequenceAdaptor
extends Adaptor

Provides access to Sequence in the datasource.

fetch

public Sequence fetch(Location location)
               throws AdaptorException
Fetches sequence corresponding to location.

Parameters:
location - location to retrieve sequence for, defaults to positive strand if sequence is unset.
Returns:
sequence corresponding to location, or null if location specified an invalid genomic region.
Throws:
AdaptorException
